clauses.body_md:
# SIMPLE AGREEMENT FOR FUTURE EQUITY

**THIS CERTIFIES THAT** in exchange for the payment by {{investor_name}} (the "**Investor**") of ${{purchase_amount}} (the "**Purchase Amount**") on or about {{date}}, {{company_name}}, a Delaware corporation (the "**Company**"), issues to the Investor the right to certain shares of the Company's Capital Stock, subject to the terms described below.

**NOTE**: This instrument is subject to Delaware General Corporation Law (DGCL) and applicable federal securities laws.

metadata.compliance_notes: Standard Delaware C-corp SAFE. Ensure compliance with DGCL §§151-174 (stock), §242 (certificate of incorporation amendments). Federal securities law: Reg D / Rule 506 exemption typically applies; ensure investor qualifies as accredited under Reg D. Certificate of Incorporation must authorize sufficient shares.
